mapper.select: SELECT s.cart_id, s.room_id, s.customer_id, s.adult_count, s.child_count, r.price, r.accommodation_id, r.room_name, r.checkin_time, r.checkout_time, r.standard_capacity, r.maximum_capacity FROM SHOPPING_CART s JOIN ROOM r on s.room_id = r.room_id JOIN CUSTOMER c on s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOPPING_CART (room_id, customer_id, adult_count, child_count, created_at) VALUES (#{roomId}, #{customerId},#{adultCount},#{childCount},now())
